VariantForms.name: VariantForms
VariantForms.description: Various words that are used interchangeably depending on the context, e.g 'aluminium' and 'aluminum'

regions.name: regions
regions.description: A particular area in which the variant form occurs, e.g. 'Great Britain'

sense_id.name: sense_id
sense_id.description: The id of the sense that co-occurs

type.name: type
type.description: The type of relation between the two words. Possible values are 'close match', 'related', 'see also', 'variant spelling', and 'abbreviation' in case of crossreferences, or 'pre', 'post' in case of collocates.

editorialNotes.name: editorialNotes
editorialNotes.description: Editorial information intended to help a human reader understand the sense

etymologies.name: etymologies
etymologies.description: The origin of the word and the way in which its meaning has changed throughout history

grammaticalFeatures.name: grammaticalFeatures
grammaticalFeatures.description: The different forms are correlated with meanings or functions which we text as 'features'

homographNumber.name: homographNumber
homographNumber.description: Identifies the homograph grouping. The last two digits identify different entries of the same homograph. The first one/two digits identify the homograph number.

variantForms.name: variantForms
variantForms.description: Various words that are used interchangeably depending on the context, e.g 'a' and 'an'

results.name: results

entries.name: entries
entries.description: A list of filters available for Dictionary Entry endpoint

translations.name: translations
translations.description: A list of filters available for Translation endpoint

inflections.name: inflections
inflections.description: A list of filters available for Lemmatron endpoint

Inflection.name: Inflection
Inflection.description: A grouping of the modifications of a word to express different grammatical categories

Labels.name: Labels
Labels.description: Schema for lexicalcategories, registers utility endpoints.

results.name: results
results.description: A list of inflections matching given word

lexicalEntries.name: lexicalEntries
lexicalEntries.description: A grouping of various senses in a specific language, and a lexical category that relates to a word

word.name: word
word.description: A given written or spoken realisation of a an entry, lowercased.

audioFile.name: audioFile
audioFile.description: The URL of the sound file

phoneticsNotation.name: phoneticsNotation
phoneticsNotation.description: The alphabetic system used to display the phonetic spelling

phoneticsSpelling.name: phoneticsSpelling
phoneticsSpelling.description: Phonetic spelling is the representation of vocal sounds which express pronunciations of words. It is a system of spelling in which each letter represents invariably the same spoken sound

regions.name: regions
regions.description: A particular area in which the pronunciation occurs, e.g. 'Great Britain'

results.name: results
results.description: The list of labels for an object. Every object is region name.

results.name: results
results.description: A list of entries and all the data related to them

lexicalEntries.name: lexicalEntries
lexicalEntries.description: A grouping of various senses in a specific language, and a lexical category that relates to a word

word.name: word
word.description: A given written or spoken realisation of a an entry, lowercased.

Sense.name: Sense
Sense.description: A lexical sense represents the lexical meaning of a lexical entry when interpreted as referring to the corresponding ontology element

closeMatches.name: closeMatches
closeMatches.description: A reference to another word that is closely related

crossReferences.name: crossReferences
crossReferences.description: A reference to another word that is closely related, might provide additional information about the subject, has a variant spelling or is an abbreviated form of it.

definitions.name: definitions
definitions.description: A list of statements of the exact meaning of a word

domains.name: domains
domains.description: A subject, discipline, or branch of knowledge particular to the Sense

examples.name: examples
examples.description: A list of written or spoken rendering of examples of use of a word or text

grammaticalNotes.name: grammaticalNotes
grammaticalNotes.description: Show transitivity statements or usage notes.

id.name: id
id.description: The id of the sense that is required for the delete procedure

markers.name: markers
markers.description: Editorial information intended to help a reader understand the Sense

parentSense.name: parentSense
parentSense.description: This sense has a super sense.

regions.name: regions
regions.description: A particular area in which the Sense occurs, e.g. 'Great Britain'

registers.name: registers
registers.description: A level of language usage, typically with respect to formality. e.g. 'offensive', 'informal'

relatedTo.name: relatedTo
relatedTo.description: A reference to a related word

seeAlso.name: seeAlso
seeAlso.description: A reference to a resource that might provide additional information about the subject

variantForms.name: variantForms
variantForms.description: Various words that are used interchangeably depending on the context, e.g 'duck' and 'duck boat'

lexicalEntries.name: lexicalEntries
lexicalEntries.description: Grammatical features, Lexical category and Sentences.

word.name: word
word.description: A given written or spoken realisation of a an entry, lowercased.

^_a-zA-Z_+$.name: ^_a-zA-Z_+$
^_a-zA-Z_+$.description: The list of labels for an object. Every object can be a lexical category, or a register, or a domain.

lexicalEntry.name: lexicalEntry
lexicalEntry.description: Description of an entry for a particular part of speech

grammaticalFeatures.description: The different forms are correlated with meanings or functions which we text as 'features'

grammaticalNotes.name: grammaticalNotes
grammaticalNotes.description: Show transitivity statements or usage notes.

inflectionOf.name: inflectionOf
inflectionOf.description: The canonical form of words for which the entry is an inflection

inflections.name: inflections
inflections.description: The modification of a word to express different grammatical categories

lexicalCategory.name: lexicalCategory
lexicalCategory.description: A linguistic category of words (or more precisely lexical items), generally defined by the syntactic or morphological behaviour of the lexical item in question, such as noun or verb

text.name: text
text.description: A given written or spoken realisation of a an entry.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Set prefix to true if you'd like to get results only starting with search string.

regions.name: regions
regions.description: Filter words with specific region(s) E.g., regions=us. For now gb, us are available for en language.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.

methods.description: Retrieve available results for a search query and language.
methods.displayName: Find results for search query.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Set prefix to true if you'd like to get results only starting with search string.

regions.name: regions
regions.description: Filter words with specific region(s) E.g., regions=us. For now gb, us are available for en language.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.

404.description: No entry is found matching supplied id and source_lang or filters are not recognized

500.description: Internal Error. An error occurred while processing the data.

methods.description: Find available translation results for a search query and language.
methods.displayName: Find translation results for search query.

exclude.name: exclude
exclude.description: Semicolon separated list of wordlist parameters to be excluded from response, presented as value pairs: LexicalCategory, domains, regions, registers, grammaticalFeatures. Parameters can take comma separated list of values.

word_length.name: word_length
word_length.description: Parameter to speficy the minimum (>), exact or maximum (<) length of the words required. E.g., >5 - more than 5 chars; <4 - less than 4 chars; >5<10 - from 5 to 10 chars; 3 - exactly 3 chars.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Filter words that start with prefix parameter

exact.name: exact
exact.description: If exact=true wordlist returns a list of entries that exactly matches the search string. Otherwise wordlist lists entries that start with prefix string.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.

400.description: disjoint sets of word_length values (eg <3>10); filter has no values; total number of filters > 20; filters and excludes values can not be the same; source_lang and translations can not be same; word_length conflicts with prefix length.

404.description: No entries is found matching supplied filters or lang or filters is not recognized.

500.description: Internal Error. An error occourred while processing the data.

methods.description: Advanced options for retrieving wordlist - exclude filter, filter by word length or match by substring (prefix).
methods.displayName: Retrieve list of words for category with advanced options.

filters_advanced.name: filters_advanced
filters_advanced.description: Semicolon separated list of wordlist parameters, presented as value pairs: LexicalCategory, domains, regions, registers. Parameters can take comma separated list of values. E.g., lexicalCategory=noun,adjective;domains=sport

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limit the number of results per response. Default and maximum limit is 5000.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Offset the start number of the result.

400.description: filter has no values; total number of filters > 20.

404.description: No entries is found matching supplied filters or lang or filters is not recognized.

500.description: Internal Error. An error occourred while processing the data.

methods.description: Retrieve list of words for particular domain, lexical category register and/or region.
methods.displayName: Retrieve list of words for category.

filters_basic.name: filters_basic
filters_basic.description: Semicolon separated list of wordlist parameters, presented as value pairs: LexicalCategory, domains, regions, registers. Parameters can take comma separated list of values. E.g., lexicalCategory=noun,adjective;domains=sport.
